main: ^It is a multi-tiered waterfall in Bislig, Surigao del Sur. Bislig is a city known as the Booming City by the Bay also known as “the Niagra Falls of the Philippines”.

c-0: ^It is said to be the widest waterfalls in the country and every morning, the vicinity is blessed because it makes a water spray or mist that forms a sprinkle of a rainbow.
